Reviews.Title: “Ideal location, wonderfully hospitable staff”
Reviews.Author: Salsad8
Reviews.Content: hotel ideally located close termini rome short walk close station quiet hotel located lovely courtyard clean staff helpful informative quiet sometimes hard rome worthy note forgot camera hurry leave realizing error called hotel panic knowing staff wasnt found dana couldnt responsive post office quickly pos italy arent efficient camera arrived safely days vacation bad note thanks staff hotel malu wonderful memories italy remain intact cant thank

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly fine for the price.”
Reviews.Author: SSAN21
Reviews.Content: near termini train station flight cant closer stayed night leaving 7am flight portugal location awesome 75 euros youd expect pretty decent size bathroom facing courtyard outside noise coming downer woman saying loud corridor 1 am talking phone stomping corridor reception 8pm wasnt tell quiet speak stay short stopover rome

Reviews.Title: “Nice and clean”
Reviews.Author: Svartn
Reviews.Content: stayed nights found nice clean hotel close termini bit tricky hotel sign spent days hotel cant staff friendly

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, comfortable stay and unbeatable location”
Reviews.Author: globalwanderer2
Reviews.Content: wife recently spent nights rome european whirlwind tour via rails booked hotel malu option based price location positive trip advisor reviews heres summary experience booked superior clean spacious comfortable windows bedroom sitting offered pleasant street views minimal road noise hotel street coupled ac units bedroom sitting cool curved brick ceiling feel front deskstaff courteous helpful hassles checking guy met arrival rome offered advice location hotels features malu 10 minute walk romes main train station little tricky theres sign outside hotel look corresponding street address youll door buzzer box youll listing hotel malu press wooden door immediately walk youll hit courtyard immediate left couple paces youll elevator stairs 1st floor left hit reception desk hotel plus located quiet street makes sleeping theres little road noise walked alot rome able walk forum colosseum 20 minutes bottom line simply beat hotel perfect location convenience value based coupled clean nice roman atmosphere five stars definitely recommend fellow travellers particularly arriving rome via rails

Reviews.Content: super friendly energetic front desk staff woman little sister assistant forgot names feel welcome spoke english helpful tips directions public transport location perfect blocks leonardo express airport train fiumicino hotel send map book entrance station hard otherwise enter tack 24 walk platform reach track 28 facilities english tv channels thats minor gripes cappucino street youre rome watch tv anyway

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, very convenient location”

Reviews.Content: hotel malu value location near termini station seedy lot touristy restaurants appreciated convenience staff friendly helpful pleasant stay overlooked courtyard quiet pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Believe the reviews”
Reviews.Author: hhislim
Reviews.Content: booked hotel based ta reviews location price hotel budget minded people dont mind spartan clean staying night met recommend similar noted staff friendly helpful termini apparently hotels building quirk limited reception hours leaving arriving 800pm special arrangements hours impact stranger arriving late prefer desk attendant

Reviews.Title: “Clean & charming hotel, friendly staff, awesome location!”

Reviews.Content: hotel five minute walk termini train station rome walking distance touristy sites day subway town spanish steps sites foot finally hotel importantly hotel clean basic ammenities ac private bathroom hairdryer added bonuses lots character staff stayed twice charming little balcony looked onto picturesque courtyard breakfast available pleased stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice location at a good price”
Reviews.Author: Boston41
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel malu 4 nights midapril enjoyed upsides location fantastic blocks termini station trains train airport subway restaurants nearby easy 525 minute walk lot main sights staff polite helpful question comfortable value money downsides office wifi otherwise set breakfast wifi system allowed 4 wifi time getting walls little thin door jostled time exited hotel recommend bet value money

Reviews.Title: “Good location helpful staff a few more facilities would be welcome”

Reviews.Content: budget hotel expect accordingly disappointed time italy stayed hotel march 4 nights location near termini station 510 min walk didnt spend 1520 min getting rome lots eating nearby food travellers budgets bathrooms clean security clean towels flower decoration requested staff dana ivan fantastic helpful length iof searching internet restaurants price bit breakfast included people equivalent hotels offering tv english channels hotels didnt mind trip view spending lot time outdoors watching tv picked quick breakfast termini nearby

Reviews.Content: pros location 5 minutes walk termini friendly service cons wifi coverage ours coverage walls thin hear noises reception corridors overall recommended hotel loved owners

Reviews.Title: “will definitely come back!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel malu 3 nights cute comfy hotel location close termini noisy staff friendly helpful patient speak english cosy clean characterful warm stayed hotel definitely visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Well located, clean basic hotel”
